title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Skills: Mobile-Based Heart Failure Health Management Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of heart diseases and fundamental smartphone usage
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners accurately identify heart failure symptoms and management methods, and propose three or more practical strategies applicable to daily life.
Learners perform diet/exercise/medication management with over 80% accuracy through problem-based learning scenarios in mobile apps.
After completing the education, maintain an app usage rate of over 70% for 4 weeks to improve self-management skills

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
